About Me

Hi, I am Jincheng! I am a Dickson instructor in the Department of Mathematics at The University of Chicago. I completed my Ph.D. in Mathematics at The University of Texas at Austin in March 2022, under the supervision of Prof. Caffarelli and Prof. Vasseur. My research interests include analysis, partial differential equations, fluid dynamics, especially the incompressible Euler equation and the Navier-Stokes equation. I received my bachelor’s degree at Xi’an Jiaotong University, where I was also a student in the Special Class for the Gifted Young before my undergraduate study.

This year, I co-organize the Calderón-Zygmund Analysis Seminar at UChicago.

Publications and Preprints

  1. Jincheng Yang: Vorticity interior trace estimates and higher derivative estimates via blow-up method, (2023). [arXiv:2308.09350][pdf]

  2. Jincheng Yang, Luhao Zhang, Ningyuan Chen, Rui Gao, Ming Hu: Decision-making with side information: a causal transport robust approach, (2022). [OptOnline:20639][pdf]

  3. Luhao Zhang, Jincheng Yang, Rui Gao: A simple and general duality proof for Wasserstein distributionally robust optimization, Operations Research, forthcoming. (2024) [arXiv:2205.00362][pdf]

  4. Alexis F. Vasseur, Jincheng Yang: Layer separation of the 3D incompressible Navier–Stokes equation in a bounded domain, Communications in Partial Differential Equations, forthcoming. (2024) [arXiv:2303.05236][pdf]

  5. Luhao Zhang, Jincheng Yang, Rui Gao: Optimal robust policy for feature-based newsvendor, Management Science, 70: 2315-2329. (2024) [OptOnline:18579][pdf]

  6. Alexis F. Vasseur, Jincheng Yang: Boundary vorticity estimates for Navier–Stokes and application to the inviscid limit, SIAM Journal on Mathematical Analysis, 55: 3081–3107. (2023) [arXiv:2110.02426][pdf]

  7. Jincheng Yang: Construction of maximal functions associated with skewed cylinders generated by incompressible flows and applications, Annales de l’Institut Henri Poincaré C. Analyse Non Linéaire, 39: 793–818. (2022) [arXiv:2008.05588][pdf]

  8. Alexis F. Vasseur, Jincheng Yang: Second derivatives estimate of suitable solutions to the 3D Navier-Stokes equations, Archive for Rational Mechanics and Analysis, 241: 683–727. (2021) [arXiv:2009.14291][pdf]

  9. Zhiwu Lin, Jincheng Yang, Hao Zhu: Barotropic instability of shear flows, Studies in Applied Mathematics, 144: 289–326. (2020) [arXiv:1801.00950][pdf]

  10. Jincheng Yang, Zhiwu Lin: Linear inviscid damping for Couette flow in stratified fluid, Journal of Mathematical Fluid Mechanics, 20: 445–472. (2018) [arXiv:1610.08924][pdf]
